Traits: Agile, finesse, thrown 10 ft., versatile S
Brace, dwarf, reach, trip, versatile p

atf_info: +1 bonus to attack rolls with a ranged weapon within 30 feet.
Take a -2 penalty to attack roll to deal an additional 1d6 damage.
Fire two arrows at once; both attacks suffer a -2 penalty.
+2 circumstance bonus to damage against a targeted creature.
Reduce the target's cover bonuses by 2 for your next attack.
Draw and fire a bow as part of the same action.
Make a ranged Strike as a free action when you take the Step action.
Hit a creature to reduce their speed by 10 feet for 1 round.
+1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls when you have 1 minute to set up and are not observed.
Redirect a missed attack to another creature within 10 feet; make a new attack roll.
Strike against every enemy within a 15-foot cone; attacks suffer a -2 penalty.
On a hit, target must succeed on a concentration check or lose the spell.
Make a Reflex save (DC equals the attack roll) to catch an arrow or bolt.
+10-foot bonus to movement speed when moving in a straight line.
Deal an extra 1d6 damage after focusing on a target for 1 round.
Allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear for 1 round.
Enemies within 30 feet are frightened 1.
Target must succeed at a Will save or become fascinated.
Make a Performance check (DC 20) to extend the duration of a composition cantrip by 3 rounds.
Ally gains a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.
Allies regain d6 equal to half level (min 1d6) Hit Points at the start of each of your turns for 3 rounds.
Allies can use your Performance check result in place of their saving throw against auditory or visual effects.
Allies gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear for 1 round.
Grant an ally a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks for 1 round.
Heal an ally for 1d8 Hit Points per action spent (up to 3 actions).
Gain an extra use of a composition cantrip that you've already used this turn.
Increase the area of your composition cantrips by 10 feet.
Cast a composition cantrip as a free action once per day.
Allies gain a +10-foot status bonus to their Speed for 1 round.
Maintain two compositions simultaneously.
Gain +2 status bonus to damage rolls, -1 penalty to AC, lasts 1 minute.
Make a single melee Strike with a +2 bonus to damage; counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty.
Stride and then make a melee Strike; gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack roll.
Gain resistance to physical damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier while raging.
Ignore the multiple attack penalty on your second attack after making a Power Attack.
When you critically hit while raging, add an additional weapon damage die.
Add your Strength modifier twice to the damage of your first melee attack each round while raging.
When you roll initiative, Demoralize a foe within 30 feet as a free action.
Demoralize a foe with a visual glare instead of verbal threats; no language requirement.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Strength checks to break objects while raging.
When you reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points, make a melee Strike as a free action.
Gain temporary Hit Points equal to 10 + your level when you begin raging.
Throw an adjacent enemy, dealing bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves against effects that would push, trip, or grapple you while raging.
Increase the bonus from Rage to +3 status bonus to damage rolls.
Heal living or harm undead within 30 feet for 1d8 Hit Points per level of the spell slot expended.
Gain the initial domain power associated with your deity's domain.
Undead creatures within 30 feet must succeed at a Will save or flee for 1d4 rounds.
Undead creatures within 30 feet take 1d6 damage per level of the spell slot expended.
Gain an additional spell slot for heal or harm, depending on your deity's alignment.
Gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against evil creatures.
Exclude a number of targets equal to your Charisma modifier from your Channel Energy effect.
Grant a weapon within 30 feet a +1 striking rune for 1 minute.
Stabilize a dying creature within 30 feet as a free action.
Gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects and negative energy.
Take control of an undead creature within 30 feet; it must succeed at a Will save or fall under your command.
Gain a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 round.
Emit bright light in a 20-foot radius; creatures within the light gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear and death effects.
Allies within 30 feet gain a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.
When you cast heal, increase the amount of healing by 2d8.
Gain access to one occult implement, granting you an additional ability based on the implement chosen.
Gain a +1 status bonus to attacks or spell DCs when wielding your chosen occult implement.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against mental effects while concentrating.
Spend 1 minute concentrating on an object to gain insight into its history and previous owners (Recall Knowledge).
Regain 1 Focus Point when you critically succeed at a save against a mental effect.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage with occult spells when you are affected by a mental effect.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Occultism checks and to checks to identify occult creatures or phenomena.
Detect invisible creatures within 30 feet as if you had imprecise senses.
Once per day, you can cast detect magic as a free action.
When you possess a significant item from a creature, gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to locate or affect that creature with spells.
Gain a +1 status bonus to DCs of occult rituals you perform.
Gain resistance to mental damage equal to half your level.
Once per day, project your mind to a distant location within 1 mile, allowing you to see and hear as if you were there for up to 10 minutes.
Gain a +2 status bonus to AC against attacks made by summoned or incorporeal creatures.
Inscribe a special sigil on an item or location, granting a +1 status bonus to defenses or saves against a specific school of magic.
Reaction to reduce damage by 2 + your level against an adjacent ally and make a melee Strike against the attacker.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells and magical effects for 1 round.
Allies within 10 feet gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear effects.
Once per day, add d6 equal to total of dice rolled persistent sanctified damage to your next melee Strike.
Choose a divine ally, such as a weapon, shield, or mount, gaining specific benefits based on the choice.
Once per day, raise your shield as a reaction to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against an attack.
As a reaction, protect an ally within 15 feet, granting them a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against one attack.
Allies within 10 feet gain the benefits of your Retributive Strike, allowing them to deal an additional 1d6 damage on a hit.
Deal an extra d6 equal to total of dice rolled damage on your first attack each round against a non-humanoid.
Gain immunity to all diseases, including supernatural and magical diseases.
Once per day, deal an additional d6 equal to total of dice rolled damage against a humanoid with a melee Strike.
Gain a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 minute, usable once per day.
When you swear an oath against an enemy, gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until it is defeated.
Once per day, if you are reduced to 0 Hit Points, you can instead drop to 1 Hit Point and immediately heal 2d8 Hit Points.
Allies within 10 feet gain resistance 5 to all damage.
Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage and have the forceful trait.
Once per day, attempt a melee Strike; if you hit, the target must succeed on a Fortitude save or be stunned 1.
Reaction to make an unarmed Strike against a creature that critically misses you with a melee attack.
On a successful hit with an unarmed Strike, the target must succeed on a Fortitude save or be sickened 1.
Make two unarmed Strikes as a single action; if both hit, combine their damage for overcoming resistances.
On a critical hit with an unarmed Strike, the target must succeed on a Fortitude save or be stunned 1.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Grapple and a +2 circumstance bonus to maintain a Grapple.
Make an unarmed Strike with a -2 penalty; if it hits, add an additional damage die.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and resistance 2 to physical damage.
Reaction to reduce damage from a melee attack by an amount equal to your level.
When you successfully Grapple a creature, it takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns while Grappled.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative checks and your first unarmed Strike in combat gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.
Once per day, add 1d6 force damage to your unarmed Strike.
Gain temporary Hit Points equal to 5 + your level when you drop to 25% or less of your maximum Hit Points.
When you critically hit with an unarmed Strike, the target is flat-footed until the start of your next turn.
Form a bond with a spirit, gaining a +1 status bonus to skill checks related to that spirit's domain (e.g., nature, healing).
Once per day, invoke a totem spirit to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls or saving throws for 1 minute.
Gain the ability to perform specific rituals related to the spirits you commune with, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the ritual skill check.
Gain an animal companion that gains the spirit trait and a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks.
Once per day, call upon your ancestors to gain a +2 status bonus to a skill check or attack roll.
Gain resistance 5 to a specific type of elemental damage (fire, cold, lightning, or acid) for 1 hour.
Learn a hex that allows you to impose a -1 status penalty on a target’s attack rolls or saving throws for 1 minute (once per day).
Once per day, teleport 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see as a free action.
Craft a magical fetish that grants a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against fear effects when carried.
Once per day, add 1d6 force damage to a melee or ranged attack.
Assume the form of your totem spirit, gaining abilities based on the chosen animal (e.g., flight, swim speed) for 1 minute.
Share damage with an ally within 30 feet, reducing their damage by half and taking the other half yourself (up to a maximum of 10 damage).
Perform a cleansing ritual that removes one condition or curse from yourself or an ally once per day.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC for 1 minute, usable once per day.
Your spirit animal or totem spirit gains a +1 status bonus to attacks and damage rolls for 1 minute, usable once per day.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls when an ally is adjacent to your target.
Reduce the armor check penalty and increase the maximum Dexterity bonus of worn armor by 1.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to avoid being surprised.
Gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with your chosen weapon.
When adjacent to an ally with a shield, gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Gain an additional reaction each round, usable only for Attacks of Opportunity.
When you hit a creature with a melee weapon, it takes an additional 1d6 damage.
When you and an ally attack the same target in the same round, both gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects that would move you or knock you prone.
When you roll initiative, you can Demoralize a foe within 30 feet as a free action.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity.
Choose a weapon group; gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls with all weapons in that group.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and damage when using the Ready action to make an attack.
As an action, move up to half your speed towards an enemy without triggering reactions.
Once per day, gain temporary Hit Points equal to 10 + your level when reduced to 0 Hit Points.
Once per day, apply a metamagic feat to a spell without increasing its casting time.
Gain a +1 bonus to Arcana checks and a +1 circumstance bonus to spell DCs against identified creatures.
Gain a +2 bonus on checks to overcome spell resistance.
Learn one additional cantrip from the arcane spell list.
Cast a cantrip as a reaction once per round.
When casting a spell, gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's level.
Once per day, heighten a spell to a higher level without using a higher-level spell slot.
Use your reaction to counter a spell by expending a spell slot of the same or higher level.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Arcana, Occultism, or Religion checks.
Once per day, cast a spell of up to 3rd level as a free action.
Replace one of your prepared spells with another spell from your known spells once per day.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Cast an additional 1st-level spell from your known spells once per day without using a spell slot.
Gain resistance 5 to a chosen energy type (fire, cold, electricity, or acid) for 1 hour, once per day.
Choose one spell you know; you cast it with a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and spell DCs.
Deal an additional d6 equal to total of dice rolled precision damage to flat-footed or flanked enemies.
When you succeed at a Reflex save against an area effect, take no damage instead of half.
Gain a +1 bonus to Perception and Thievery checks to locate and disable traps.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to disarm attempts and disarm as a single action.
Use a reaction to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against one attack.
You cannot be flat-footed to hidden, undetected, or flanking creatures.
Add your Dexterity modifier instead of Strength to damage rolls with finesse weapons.
Once per round, attempt to Feint as a free action.
Hide even while being observed, as long as you are in dim light or darkness.
Make an attack of opportunity against a foe that is hit by another ally within reach.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative checks.
Gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls when attacking from a hidden or concealed position.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against mental effects.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls when attacking a creature that has not yet acted in combat.
Move at full speed while using the Stealth skill without penalty.
Gain a +10-foot bonus to your movement speed when traveling in the wilderness.
Gain a +1 bonus to Survival checks and treat natural difficult terrain as normal terrain.
You and allies within 30 feet move through natural difficult terrain at full speed.
You cannot be slowed by difficult terrain caused by natural environments.
Gain low-light vision or darkvision (if you already have low-light vision) when in natural environments.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks made to find food, water, or shelter in the wilderness.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against fatigue and exhaustion effects.
You automatically know the direction of true north and cannot get lost in natural environments.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks made to recall knowledge about geography or terrain.
Once per day, recover 1d8 Hit Points after resting for 10 minutes in a natural environment.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Medicine checks when treating wounds in the wilderness.
Gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and AC when fighting in a specific type of terrain (forest, desert, etc.).
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to spot hidden or concealed creatures in natural environments.
Once per day, change your chosen terrain for the Terrain Mastery feat after resting for 10 minutes.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves against environmental hazards and extended travel fatigue.
Gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and DCs with spells from your chosen school of magic.
Add two additional spells to your spellbook at each level, instead of one.
Learn two additional cantrips from the arcane spell list.
Once per day, cast any spell you know without expending a spell slot.
Reduce the spell level increase of metamagic feats by 1 (minimum +0).
Use your reaction to counter a spell by expending the same or higher-level spell slot.
Choose one spell you know; you can prepare it once per day without expending a spell slot.
Once per day, regain an expended spell slot of up to 5th level.
Once per day, cast a spell of up to 3rd level as a free action.
Your familiar gains an additional familiar ability from the list of familiar abilities.
Cast a ritual that provides a +1 circumstance bonus to AC for you and your allies for 1 hour.
Gain a +2 bonus to spell DCs for a specific school of magic of your choice.
Once per day, cast a spell using a higher-level spell slot without altering its effects.
Swap one prepared spell with another of the same level from your spellbook once per day.
Detect magical auras within 30 feet as if using detect magic at will.
Gain an additional 3 Hit Points per level.
Gain an additional reaction each round, usable only for Attacks of Opportunity.
Reduce the time to recover from the fatigued, sickened, or frightened condition by half.
Gain a +2 bonus to a chosen skill (e.g., Athletics, Perception).
Gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with a chosen weapon.
Gain a +2 bonus on Will saving throws.
Gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude saving throws.
Gain a +2 bonus on Reflex saving throws.
Gain a +2 bonus to initiative checks.
When reduced to 0 Hit Points, you do not fall unconscious and can continue acting until you reach negative Hit Points equal to your Constitution score.
Increase your base land speed by 5 feet.
Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks made while you are moving through threatened areas.
Gain a +2 bonus on checks to resist nonlethal damage, environmental effects, and exhaustion.
Gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks and to initiative when you are not surprised.
Make a single melee Strike with a -2 penalty to the attack roll to deal an additional weapon damage die.
Once per day, exhale a cone of elemental energy (fire, cold, acid, or lightning) dealing 6d6 damage; Reflex save for half.
Gain a +4 bonus to Strength checks and Strength-based skill checks for 1 minute, once per day.
Once per day, make a melee touch attack to drain 1d6 Hit Points from a target and heal yourself for the same amount.
Once per day, transform into a hybrid werewolf form for 1 minute, gaining a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls, and a +10-foot bonus to movement speed.
Gain resistance 10 to cold and negative energy, and a +2 bonus to saves against death effects.
Gain resistance 5 to physical damage and a +2 bonus to Fortitude saves for 1 minute, once per day.
Once per day, gain a +2 bonus to Charisma-based checks and fire resistance 10 for 1 hour.
Gain a +2 natural armor bonus to AC and resistance 5 to the energy type associated with a dragon's breath (fire, cold, acid, lightning).
Once per day, teleport up to 30 feet to a shadowy or dimly lit area as a free action.
Once per day, enter a state of elemental fury, adding 1d6 elemental damage (fire, cold, acid, or lightning) to your melee attacks for 1 minute.
Once per day, make a melee touch attack to paralyze a target for 1d4 rounds unless it succeeds on a Fortitude save.
Once per day, when reduced to 0 Hit Points, instantly heal for 5d6 Hit Points and surround yourself with a fiery aura that deals 2d6 fire damage to creatures within 10 feet.
Once per day, call down a bolt of lightning as a ranged touch attack, dealing 4d6 lightning damage and deafening the target for 1 round.
Gain regeneration 5 for 1 minute, which stops functioning if you take acid or fire damage, usable once per day.
Once per day, use telepathy to communicate with any creature within 60 feet, and cast mind-affecting spells as if you had the Psionic subtype.
